mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APP (APP_NUM, USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_SAVE) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_APP.nextval, #{userId}, #{annNum}, #{appFile}, #{etc}, #{appSave})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE FROM TBL_APP WHERE APP_NUM = #{appNum}
SELECT USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE FROM TBL_APP WHERE APP_NUM > 0 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = #{keyword} AND ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_APP_EVA WHERE TBL_APP_EVA.APP_NUM = APP.APP_NUM) AS EVA_END FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP WHERE ANN_NUM = #{keyword} ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) APP ) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_APP_EVA WHERE TBL_APP_EVA.APP_NUM = APP.APP_NUM AND TBL_APP_EVA.RATER_ID =#{raterId}) AS EVA_END FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNum} ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) APP ) WHERE (RNUM >= #{cri.pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{cri.pageEnd}) ORDER BY EVA_END ASC, APP_REG_DATE ASC, APP_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNum})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.USER_ID = #{keyword} AND APP_SAVE=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, APP.APP_NUM,APP.ANN_NUM,APP.USER_ID, APP.APP_REG_DATE, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.USER_ID = #{keyword} AND APP_SAVE=0 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.USER_ID = #{keyword} AND APP_SAVE=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, APP.APP_NUM,APP.ANN_NUM,APP.USER_ID, APP.APP_REG_DATE, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.USER_ID = #{keyword} AND APP_SAVE=1 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT APP_NUM, ANN_NAME, APP_REG_DATE, EVA_REG_DATE, PASS_CHECK, CASE WHEN (EVA_REG_DATE > CURR_DATE) THEN '평가중' WHEN (EVA_REG_DATE < CURR_DATE) THEN DECODE(PASS_CHECK, 1, '합격', '불합격') END AS PASS_MSG from ( SELECT app.APP_NUM, ann.ANN_NAME, app.APP_REG_DATE, eva.EVA_REG_DATE, (SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) CURR_DATE, (select count(*) from tbl_pass where tbl_pass.APP_NUM = app.APP_NUM) as PASS_CHECK FROM TBL_APP app,TBL_ANN ann, TBL_EVA eva WHERE app.ANN_NUM = ann.ANN_NUM and ann.ANN_NUM = eva.ANN_NUM and app.APP_NUM in (SELECT APP_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT APP_NUM, ANN_NAME, APP_REG_DATE, EVA_REG_DATE, PASS_CHECK, CASE WHEN (EVA_REG_DATE > CURR_DATE) THEN '평가중' WHEN (EVA_REG_DATE < CURR_DATE) THEN DECODE(PASS_CHECK, 1, '합격', '불합격') END AS PASS_MSG FROM ( SELECT app.APP_NUM, ann.ANN_NAME, app.APP_REG_DATE, eva.EVA_REG_DATE, (SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) CURR_DATE, (select count(*) from tbl_pass where tbl_pass.APP_NUM = app.APP_NUM) as PASS_CHECK FROM TBL_APP app,TBL_ANN ann, TBL_EVA eva WHERE app.ANN_NUM = ann.ANN_NUM and ann.ANN_NUM = eva.ANN_NUM and app.APP_NUM in (SELECT APP_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{userId})))
